title: Investigation of Special Sunny Sunday Pet Box
content: We are currently investigating the issues relating to the Special Sunny Sunday Pet Box from the Week 6 - August 27th, 2023 Sunny Sunday Event.

title: Scheduled Game Update - August 30, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled game update on Wednesday, August 30, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 10:00 PM AEST).

title: Last Day for the Marvel Machine!
content: Don't miss out, because the Marvel Machine closes up shop on Sunday, August 27 at 11:59 PM PDT!

title: Important Changes to Second Pendant Slot
content: Learn about upcoming changes to MapleStory's second pendant slot.

title: Scheduled Cash Shop Maintenance - August 24, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled cash shop maintenance on Thursday, August 24, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 10:00 PM AEST).
